website_summaries.verdict: It's not expensive, it's well made, it's available in a choice of colors, and - importantly - hundreds of owners absolutely love it.
pros: A clever, wall-mounted solution that is an absolute work of art
Made of modern wood with laminate surfaces
Allows you to put a useable computer desk more or less anywhere
cons: Although it frees up floor space, it does mean that working area is limited

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lil space for the missus to use as vanity. Added mirror and light
customer_reviews.author: Chakubi

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: If you are think about getting this I recommend getting it I turned it in to a vanity in my room! Works great! It really doesn’t take up that much space
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: ... much space in your area this is a very smart way to go about it
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a desk and have no much space in your area this is a very smart way to go about it. Everything about this product is good. The quality the color and the price just made it a perfect match for me. I recommended 100%
customer_reviews.author: kamoche

customer_reviews.title: Great function
customer_reviews.text: I really like this desk. It opens up the floor underneath my desk and makes it looks so clean. The cords are kept hidden away and tidy. I put mine in a corner where a normal desk makes it seem so dark but this desk brightens it up and is very functional. There is a short horizontal piece behind where you keep the monitor (you can see it in the pictures) and this covers part of the hanging system but I have found it very useful by purchasing peel and stick dry erase board and attaching it so that now it's a mini dry erase area great for little notes and inspirational quotes.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Standing Desk Option
customer_reviews.text: Using this as a standing desk, and couldn't be happier with it! Putting it together took a while, but instructions were easy to follow and the anchor screws it came with help make it EXTREMELY sturdy. I love the added storage I have for all of my knick-knacks and office supplies. Would definitely recommend this! One note to future buyers- As other reviewers have stated, it's a flat surface and there is no slide-out keyboard tray. The way it's built, you might have trouble installing a keyboard tray (see picture), but if you have a monitor riser or something similar, you'll be able to get your monitor high enough to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amy P

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Some of the hardware was missing or kinda cheaply made but it was all good because dad had extra parts and the right tools to put it together. Dad didn't like how heavy the wood was (cheap wood) but I think it's fine considering the price. Assembly is easy/medium level of difficulty. The end product looks super awesome and feels sturdy! Such a great way to organize and display all my favorite things. My entire room is full of white "floating" desks and shelves because it makes cleaning the carpet floor so much easier. Great product in general and I hope it lasts me many more years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Benadette

customer_reviews.title: great floating desk converted to a makeup vanity
customer_reviews.text: With Makeup vanities costing upwards of $300-$600 for a light up mirror and small table I decided to make my own, great floating desk converted to a makeup vanity. $20 mirror $20 vanity leds and this desk brings it all together. As others have commented on the bracket mount I added two screws through the bottom into studs for added safety. I put this together for my Girlfriend she loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing wall rack
customer_reviews.text: The desk is a good size and feels sturdy. Would have given it 5 stars but its missing the wall rack so i have no way to hang it, which defeats the purpose of a "wall mounted" desk. Should be advertised as bulky, bookshelf. ***Updated review, I contacted manufacturer, Prepac, and because I purchased it through Amazon Warehouse they will not even process my order for a wall mount rack. So as a wall mounted floating desk, this particular product is terrible and I do HATE it. So much so, that I am willing to take it all apart to ship it back!
customer_reviews.author: TBuck4Reno

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING desk - this thing has held up for 6 years!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I'm getting rid of it is that I've graduated to needing more space - it is small, but sports amazing amounts of room for organization because of the tiny cubby holes on the sides. However, I need more space to spread out my makeup and the desk portion itself is too small for me. For what it is, it's solid, clean and beautiful. I loved this desk a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Adria A. Wells

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE MY VANITY
customer_reviews.text: I love makeup, I do it for fun. I have acquired quite a collection and needed somewhere to organize it and play around with it. Actual vanity’s are pretty pricy so I settled on this desk. I love it! It turned out better than I thought it would. It was difficult to put together, the screw holes didn’t all match up and the mounting screws were pretty flimsy so I did purchase some sturdier ones from the Home Depot, which is why I give it 4 stars. All in all, I’m super pleased with this purchase. I use it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we needed! Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this desk for my daughter. We live in a small house so saving space is priority. This desk is perfect, does not take up any floor space and looks great, gives her lots of room to do homework, crafts, and color. I would've given this product 5 stars if it were easier to assemble. 2 of the bolts completely broke of trying to tighten the nuts. I had to run to our hardware store to get new bolts and nuts. They do not provide extra parts. This does take 2 people to put together and hang. Other than the issue with the bolts, this is a great buy. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with this desk.
customer_reviews.text: I’m very impressed with this floating desk. My daughter wishes this was available when she lived at home since our home is very small and it was impossible to find a desk to fit into her room. Thank goodness my husband is mechanically inclined putting it together since directions had no words just diagrams. Took about an hour. I would highly recommend this desk for those with small rooms or not since it leaves the floor open for easy vacuuming.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice for the price.  Good hardware and mounting system
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, and they went together as expected. I do glue them where there is bare-wood on bare-wood, but there isn't much of that here. Fairly attractive and the hardware was good. Look like they will be pretty sturdy on the wall, but they are missing a couple measurements in the instructions, so if you want to be very accurate on installation height, you'll need to do some quick measuring and light math.
customer_reviews.author: T. Church

customer_reviews.title: Space Saver!!!!! Money well spent!!!
customer_reviews.text: Homeschool Mom approved!!! I bought one to test out before I bought for ALL the kids... just signed on to order the rest. The room I have back from just mounting one of these puppies to the wall makes my busy house seem less cluttered! (Mom win!) Plus my son loves that he now has an organized space that he can customize with photos and personal items, like his own little cubicle. It only hold 100 lbs but that's not a problem with the designed space. It was a pain in the neck to put together but you only have to do it once. Easy to mount and secure on the wall. Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Classy Buckskin Books

customer_reviews.title: Great desk!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great space saving desk and fit my extra large Mac screen perfectly. It was not fun putting it together, but once it was up I was glad I had made this purchase. It has a nice weight to it and will definitely save some space for me in my little corner of the wall. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S.

customer_reviews.title: Bought two
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, one white and one espresso for my daughter's offices. Everything fits together well, assembly is simple enough and they look nice on the wall. They ARE particle board, which I was aware of but seems some think they are solid wood. Both desks had at least one piece with corner damage but it was minimal -looks like it happened in shipping. Just be careful to not put any drinks on these that sweat without a coaster or your particle board will bubble and leave a permanent scar. All in all, perfect for a kids desk. Tidy, space saving and functional.
customer_reviews.author: Jasycace

customer_reviews.title: ASSEMBLY IS TEDIOUS AND WE DID GET A DEFECTIVE PART BUT...
customer_reviews.text: Thank God my husband is a carpenter, so he had the necessary tools and piece to replace a defective bolt that just-so-happened to be a main one. Had it not been that way, this review would be very different! The desk catches the eye immediately; such a wonderful piece of furniture without having to take up so much space (very minimal, actually). Definitely one of my favorite Amazon purchases!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan's Mom

customer_reviews.title: great desk for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great desk and may add one to my bedroom. Arrived in good shape, lots of foam around the edge for protection, which is good. Why did the mounting bracket have to be the exact size? could have some room for error. Also, when mounting bracket to wall get some better lags, i stripped out the screws mounting it and replaced with lags i had. i also stripped out one of the heads on the mounting bracket, just be careful and be sure you are not cross threaded. desk went together easy other than those things. i did it myself, just awkward mounting to wall because the bracket is exact size.
customer_reviews.author: tater2005

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful desk!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful desk!!!! Came package very well and secure. Very sturdy,loves that it attaches to a wall and has clean lines.Only thing to be aware of has no storage space for computer tower or printer.We did what someone else did for a printer, get a single shelf same color as desk ,attach by side of desk on wall ,make sure sturdy and wa-la put your printer on there. As for the tower ,ours is meant for floor, so we put it under the desk.It is a wonder computer desk even with out the storage for tower ir printer.The bonus is the shelving for decoration or for nic- knacks :)
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build easy to hang
customer_reviews.text: Easy to build easy to hang, Spans 3 studs, just wish it had rounded corners, but perfect design for laptop, make up and home work, Top is not laminated but looks semi durable, edge of top has plastic laminate wish top had same but to new to say it it will last. Just my input, Also if you are using adjustable office chair I would mount 1 inch higher.
customer_reviews.author: Applianceguy14

customer_reviews.title: The price was right.
customer_reviews.text: The price was right for this desk considering the time it takes to put it together. LOTS of pieces!!! You need to have some construction ability, patience, and time. It took about 3.5 hours to assemble. When it is assembled it is very nice, useful and a space saver.
customer_reviews.author: Georgann

customer_reviews.title: Good Desk - Bad Instructions
customer_reviews.text: The desk turned out great but I've built things like this with much better instructions. The pictures don't necessarily help and there are no words. I've experienced the same before with other products by this company. They definitely need to review their instruction booklets.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Blake

customer_reviews.title: Great desk. Clear directions.
customer_reviews.text: We really like this desk. By hanging on the wall it deletes the table legs and keeps floor space open. It looks great in my daughter's room. She likes it because it is unusual and her friends don't have anything like it. Anything that makes reading and homework fun... It went together quickly. Directions were excellent including an "everything you will need to complete this project" section right up front. There are several very long bolts driven by an allen wrench so I would add some hex bits for your drill to the list. They saved a ton of time driving those bolts into the wall studs.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great desk!!
customer_reviews.text: Took my husband and I about 1 and half hours to put together and put up on wall. I feel it can be done with 1 person but much easier and quicker with 2. My son absolutely loves the desk and so do I. Seems sturdy and functional yet modern enough for my techie son.
customer_reviews.author: mommy of 2

customer_reviews.title: Good Floating Desk for the $$ But Prepac Needs Some Quality Control!
customer_reviews.text: This looks beautiful from afar. Right outta the box there were a few issues: The edge piece in one spot wasn't sealed properly and there seems to be some kind of gluey mess stain on the desk as well. The price was right and it is serving the purpose we needed it for. I'd give it 5 stars if not for the 2 problems I listed above.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Lil Family

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DESK FOR ANY ROOM
customer_reviews.text: We put this floating desk in our TV room. It's perfect for the desktop computer and a quasi charging station for the iPads, cell phones, etc. You can hide the surge protector and all of the cords behind the desk in the bottom portion so they aren't hanging down all over. It comes unassembled and there were lots of pieces, but after you put it together, it wasn't hard at all to mount on the wall. Do measure your space before you purchase this item. It's bigger than it looks (and that isn't a bad thing). I'm already looking for other places to put more of these floating desks. Thanks PrePac!!! Great Idea!!!
customer_reviews.author: DancinCheri

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this desk. It takes up so little space in an already small room. The only problem I had was not having all the equipment to put it together. First I had borrow someone else's drill. Then I had to go buy a drill bit (7/32). Not in including all the prepratory work, it took two people about 2 hours to put it together. Maybe if you're an expert ikea shopper, you can do it in half the time. Still it was the worth the effort; it is very pretty for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: 3 days to assemble alone
customer_reviews.text: Ugh! I love this desk, but I feel this way after 2 stubbed toes, a broken nail, and scrapes and scratches all over myself. not to mention 2 additional trips to the hardware store. I reccomend not ordering unless you have a hammer, an auro wrench, a drill bit, and a STUD FINDER WITH BATTERIES IN IT!!!! I feel like an idiot and have 3 holes in my wall now..... do not use the "tap and try" method of finding studs. end product... is exactly what I wanted.... I live in a studio and I have limited space. This was a perfect addition
customer_reviews.author: Tamkin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us :)
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my husband who is in a wheelchair and is constantly banging his feet on desk and table legs. It came in a daunting number of pieces but the directions were easy to follow and it came out very solid! Also looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: jo5ie

customer_reviews.title: over all its good but I wish all the hardware was better
customer_reviews.text: while the pieces are packed okay, there is still some bruising that occurs from shipping service. thicker boxes could prevent this from happening. The unit went together well minus 2 side bolts. had to jury rig to hold as the nylon nut would not thread properly onto the bolt. over all its good but I wish all the hardware was better. I called the provided # , left a message of what issue I was having and did not get any contact back. not sellers fault more the manufacturing company. note I purchased 2 units. and 2nd one is good !!
customer_reviews.author: SWAT

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: I really am happy with this purchase. It was a bit hard to put together but the final touch was nice to see on the wall. Will purchase another one an place a mirror in the middle to make it as a vanity/desk for my daughter. She has a laptop so she can move her computer away from it unlike mines. Gives it a 👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: L R.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Desk, Great as a Makeup Vanity Too!
customer_reviews.text: We loved this desk! We have had it for 3+ years and my daughter used it as a makeup vanity with a mirror placed in the middle instead of a computer. It was perfect! It is sturdy and held up great. Lots of great shelf space and a hole in the back for electrical cords. She has outgrown it but I am sad to see it go. I think it's a great piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny G

customer_reviews.title: It is a Great Space Saver!
customer_reviews.text: Holiday & Birthday Gift to granddaughter's make over room. Her bedroom is small 10-x12 and this Floating "wall mount" desk was perfect. Took about 1 1/2 hours to put together and mounted. Easy to follow directions. It is very heavy as it is pressed wood and will need two people to mount to wall. I always use wood glue on put-together furniture to give it that extra strength. From ready reviews one person said the color rubbed off "a worn spot" on the desk top from his computer mouse so I put a clear plexiglass on the top.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer GA USA

customer_reviews.title: Really nice desk that feels remarkably sturdy for hanging on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice desk that feels remarkably sturdy for hanging on the wall. Assembly took about 30 min plus mounting time. As others have noted, a standard high outlet will interfere with the bottom horizontal piece. You basically have two options (besides finding a alternate location). First, you can notch out the bottom which is what I did. Or, you can simply leave off that last piece. From what I could see, it doesn't serve any real function. I put this in my daughters room. It's the perfect size for a kids room and doesn't take up any floor space.
customer_reviews.author: epabs

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for a kids room!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a desk that did not take up too much space, and this desk is AWESOME! If you hang the rail correctly, and INTO THE STUDS, this desk is super solid. Beware for VERY sharp corners though. We use a TRIPP TRAPP by Stokke chair, and it looks awesome.
customer_reviews.author: S.N.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Great Look
customer_reviews.text: I have an iMac at my home and computer desks in stores were just too big since the iMac has the PC build in and there only one wire for the whole thing. This compliments the silver and white of the iMac and it's keyboard and mouse. I was a little iffy on its quality, but once the whole thing was put together, it was quite sturdy. But then again, the only thing I have on the whole thing is the iMac, keyboard, mouse, and some decor to tie the whole room together.
customer_reviews.author: PHUONG PHAM

customer_reviews.title: So cute for distance learner
customer_reviews.text: Totally love this desk it fits behind the door. I wish the desk part lifted up for when it is not on use, but love the desk
customer_reviews.author: KimH

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for anyone looking to buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product, reading other post about how screws and holes would not line up, I had no issues! (Note, I had to remove the lower panel to allow access to my outlet (see picture)).
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Good condition
customer_reviews.text: I love my desk, but I was really pissed off how long it took to get delivered almost 2 weeks. The assembly was a little tedious, you will definitely need someone to help you. The instructions were pretty straightforward, just be mindful when putting the screws through the wall, it has to attach to the metal or wood frame.
customer_reviews.author: cbprincess

customer_reviews.title: most functional use of space and looks nice too
customer_reviews.text: by far the best home desk i have ever had. just the right amount of desk space and cubby spaces. easy to work on and out of the way. no dust bunnies hiding underneath. i mounted mine at bar height so that i could stand and work or use a bar stool height chair. super convenient and decent quality. rock solid if mounted correctly. looks good and clean and out of the way. i won't go back to a traditional desk, i would rather use this even though it means looking at a wall instead of a desk that could face a window.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrod Kowalski

customer_reviews.title: this desk is awesome. I mean the only negative thing that I ...
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this desk is awesome. I mean the only negative thing that I can say about it is that it sure does take forever to assemble it and get it together so if you live on your own, you really might want to consider paying the extra $100 for the assembling. Nevertheless, it's worth every dime... It saves a large amount of space in the room that it's in, it's very strong, love the color, very spacious... All in all, it's an awesome desk & I'd recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Great desk
customer_reviews.text: Liked it so much. We purchased another. Love the space saving floating desk. Recommend to everyone Just find the stud first.
customer_reviews.author: Holly D.

customer_reviews.title: White floating desk
customer_reviews.text: Love it, love it, love it. I have extra space. I can now check to see what the children are doing online much easier now. The cords are out of sight, tho not completely which is what I expected. The shelves are a little small and even that is fine. It still holds whatever I want to use it for except to hold anything tall. Once I get rid of my PC I will use it as a regular desk. Needed two people to put together; otherwise it was easy to assemable. So far with seven people using it, it has held up to my expectations. Would I recommend this wall desk? Absoluately with no reservations.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi E Manning

customer_reviews.title: Great design!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my son's room. The desk has minimal footprint. It arrived ahead of schedule and completely intact. I was impressed with the packaging and the desk arrived in pristine shape (I had been concerned about possible damage in shipping). All parts were included and the instructions were easy to follow. Nice design. It would be a great addition to have a small drawer for pen, pencils, note pads, etc. Overall very pleased. Far superior to the desk I bought, exchanged, and returned to a local Office box store.
customer_reviews.author: wtjones

customer_reviews.title: Just love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just assembled this today and absolutely love it. Its perfect for my daughter’s room. I am glad that its spcacious and the height can be adjusted as she grows.
customer_reviews.author: Adnan Jiwani

customer_reviews.title: Saves space, looks great!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect. Allowed for change I kids height as they grow. Murray have adjustable seats too. Perfect for us. Setup one at 25"and another at 27" for my young girls.
customer_reviews.author: Round Rear

customer_reviews.title: Great desk, cool design, functional and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, functional and neat design. Arrived quickly and decentently priced. Has a hidden shelf area for cords. The top shelf is wide enough for office supplies (not wide enough for things like a printer though).
customer_reviews.author: C.K.A.Z.Klapp

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful desk
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter. It screws straight into three different studs with long bolts. I believe an elephant could sit on it! Super sturdy and space saving for her small room. Took about an hour to build by myself, but another 45 to hang with me and a two teenagers. This desk is heavy, so help is needed when putting it on the wall.I also should note that in order to hang it, I had to loosen the metal hanging hooks on the desk to mount it, then tighten afterwards in order for it to sit on the rail properly.
customer_reviews.author: airbornewife1081

customer_reviews.title: You need to people to assemble and hang.
customer_reviews.text: It’s is just what we needed for our 8 (almost 9yo) homeschooler. It would be good for any child to have a work space to do homework, craft, or whatever. It was a little difficult to assemble but with 2 people it took an hour not rushing. I would recommend so far!
customer_reviews.author: JULIET L GUBERMAN

customer_reviews.title: B+
customer_reviews.text: fairly simple installation following along with the instructions. other than trying to find the studs in my wall (hahah) the desk its self is pretty sturdy and decent quality considering thr price. I recommend installing the desk at the height the instructions say to do. only reason whu this product gets a b+ and not an a is because one of the shelves was cracked/defective on arrival. I did not notice until I was almost finished installing. I highly recommend inspecting all pieces before putting the desk together. other than that I love the desk! Looks great, saves room, and is fairly sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Doppel

customer_reviews.title: Item missing a lot of parts!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible!!! We get ready to put this thing together and there were a lot of parts missing now rebox? Return? Wait for another one? Not worth the time or the money. Very sad!
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful desk, horrible assembly directions
customer_reviews.text: This desk is beautiful BUT a epic pain in the BUTT to assemble. It's worth it. We couldn't use the screws provided because our home is concret block and steel beam. We needed to buy 1/4" x 2-3/4" Tapcon concrete wcrews to mount it. I would have given this 5 stars but the directions are horrific. It's a shame to because the desk is truly impressive and space saving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver desk
customer_reviews.text: I live by myself in a 1 bedroom home built in the 30's so space is a premium. This wall desk is exactly as described. Pretty good value as well. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Whaler

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable!!! Exactly what I had in mind for my daughters bedroom. Perfect for her now and will most definitely be perfect as she grows. I couldn't be happier!!! It is so cute!!! We attached it to 3 studs as the directions stated and the thing is solid as a rock. Don't let the term 'floating' deter you, this is perfect for tight or limited space and has a very stylish unique look.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It turned out beautifully! You definitely need a beam finder, but it's absolutely beautiful. My husband put it together by himself. While he held it, I screwed it into the beam. It's quite heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine A.

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Assembly was easy although a little time ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Assembly was easy although a little time consuming. None of the parts are labeled in the instructions. Labels would have made it easier to assemble quicker. After 2 months of use the desk has been great. Also like the lower built in cubby to hide power cables and cutouts to run electronics cables.
customer_reviews.author: Nita

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and sharp edges on desktop
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to assemble with cam type bolts. One would not go in properly at all. Extremely heavy. Very sharp edges that are perfect height to injure child. Daughter has gotten scraped once so far. A constant worry that additional injuries are imminent. Will have to remove from wall and trash product. Very disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P Post

customer_reviews.title: Space Saver to the Rescue!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this desk as I was in need of a space saving desk to hold a desktop and all the accessories. This desk didn't take long to put together, hides the majority of the cords/wires, and looks neat & tidy. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T918

customer_reviews.title: Very compact space saver
customer_reviews.text: Love the desk. It has lots of leg room underneath, and the spaces on the sides make storing things off the desk easy. I also have 2 computer monitors on the desk, and still have lots of room to work. My office is pretty small, but with this desk, it makes it look even larger!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Larger than I expected but very nice, my husband used more secure hardware to hang the desk. We bought it for our 12 year old daughter.. she loves it. It is bigger then I thought but it's really nice and doesn't stick out too far. Highly recommend this desk! You will definitely need 2 people to put it up!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product - Easy to Assemble and Install!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to be able to use our guest room as a small home office, without overbearing the room. This met my needs very well. It showed up right on time, and was undamaged. It was easy to unpack, with easy to follow instructions, and mounted on the wall with no problems. I have been using it now for ~3 months with no complaints at all. I am considering purchasing another for my daughters bedroom for her homework.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wells

customer_reviews.title: This is a great space saver
customer_reviews.text: This is a great space saver. We have this in our master bedroom and it's great for my work from home needs. Make sure to follow the instructions for height installation. We decided to put it slightly higher because of our chair, but no other chairs fit comfortably. Standard chair fits the height requirements they provide. We've considered this for our kids rooms as well.
customer_reviews.author: DLEIT

customer_reviews.title: Nice but frustrating to build
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she likes it a lot. It took me awhile to put it together. Had to loosen some parts to actually get it to come together, which was a pain in the ass. Manufacturer needs to label the boards for less confusion. One part I had tightened had caused the particle board to break up. Other than that blemish, my daughter still lives it. Don't know if I would order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Yniquez

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, my daughter and I did it ourselves. Lots of room, even for a full keyboard and standard monitor. Great for smaller spaces.
customer_reviews.author: MamaheatherRN

customer_reviews.title: Great desk for kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's room so his homework wouldn't take over the kitchen table. Looks great and he really enjoys having it and using it.
customer_reviews.author: Shana Looney

customer_reviews.title: Space saving
customer_reviews.text: Timing to put together wasn’t accurate but overall easy. Not labeled very well but easy to figure out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Desk is awesome but the instructions were terrible
customer_reviews.text: Desk is awesome but the instructions were terrible. None of the pieces were were labeled. Had to guess how to put all the pieces together and the bolts were mixed up. Very frustrating to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando X.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered two of these for work. They both ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for work. They both arrived on time and no damage. My husband had no problem assembling or mounting either desk, all pieces were included, holes and hardware aligned properly and he had no difficulty with instructions. The fact that desk is not made of real wood was not an issue as I would never expect it to be at this price and I read the product description which states what it is made of!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon R.

customer_reviews.title: One piece was missed
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived to home but the box looked like was opened before. Anyway, I built the desk, my surprise was that a piece of wood was missed, it wasn't into the box. I left it like this and and I put it on the wall, but with this small piece missed. I didn't go to disarm it after build it.
customer_reviews.author: Nestor

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! I bought this for my wife
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! I bought this for my wife. She put it together herself, it took her probably about 4 hours (she was too impatient to wait for help, ha!). We hung it together (we found 3 studs to hang it on). It's amazing, she absolutely loves it. We hung it a few inches higher than what the instructions said to, and it looks absolutely perfect. It makes the room look so much bigger since there aren't any legs!
customer_reviews.author: Drew5972

customer_reviews.title: Cheap desk...
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made, but serves its purpose I guess. Be careful when putting together, I pushed the dowels too hard into the top piece (by hand) and they busted through the top! Had to putty and paint before I could finish assembly. The trim under the top shelf along the wall doesn't fit right, and doesn't feel secure. Same with the small side shelves.
customer_reviews.author: CompGuy87

customer_reviews.title: Corners are sharpe otherwise good table for the price
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, I wish the table corners were round as well, as oppose to sharp, it would have added to the elegance of this table and made it safer. I was able to assemble is in an hour. Looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Wise One

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for a small room
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed a makeup desk and her room is small. This fit perfectly and looks fantastic. I set it 6" higher so she could use a stool and I would not have to raise it as she gets taller. It was shipped fast, packed well with nothing damaged or scratched, easy instructions. It was a one dad job and I had it done in an hour or two. It was a fun project for me and she is thrilled with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C

customer_reviews.title: Great product and good customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Good product we ordered 3 for our kids. 1 out of the 3 had a damaged part. I emailed there customer services with the requested information and had a replacement part in about a week.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Great desk
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Provided instructions very easy to follow. Ensure to take account that hangers on desk are about 6” below top of desk when mounting bar.
customer_reviews.author: BILL

customer_reviews.title: Prepac White Floating Desk
customer_reviews.text: This is great. It was easy to assemble and mount. It looks like a million centered on short wall of my wife's craft room. The white w/black trim office chair we purchased to go with it. They were made for each other. I just reviewed the chair too. I'm going to have to take it down to move an electrical outlet (move it up behind the desk to attach a power strip) which will eliminate any wires hanging around.
customer_reviews.author: JimP

customer_reviews.title: As easy as amazon is to deal with
customer_reviews.text: As I whole, I trust my $2,000 mac on this, but when it arrived one piece was slightly damaged and ended up failing when trying to install. The manufacturer themselves sent out a replacement piece. As easy as amazon is to deal with, I have to say this was an even easier process. Shipping was a little lag, but it came across border. Great company to sell for Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: JWJ

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.  I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I like this desk. It really does make the space feel a bit bigger, and is pretty sturdy. The wall-mounting hardware is good, and definitely be prepared to put some muscle into the installation. As you might already expect, will require drilling. It's not too hard to remove and place somewhere else either. Hardware is reusable and it looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Nice floating desk
customer_reviews.text: A great desk for limited space, I like how it can be hung for individual height. My husband had no difficulty assembling or hanging it. Other reviews stated that it was not sturdy but attaching the back strip to wall studs makes this a very solid unit. Best of all, it looks great in my daughters bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: julie WA state

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Desk!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7 year old daughter and she loves it. I’ve put together a lot of desks in my time, and this was by far one of the easiest and well constructed pieces. Instructions were laid out well, every hole lined up perfectly, and it all resulted in a very solid desk!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great functional floating desk
customer_reviews.text: This is a great floating desk. It's rather simple to put together and seems sturdy. We have ours in our treatment room. It declutters the room nicely. The white is bright and the desk space is...spaceous. Ours was missing a part so we contacted the manufacturer. They were prompt to reply and sent out a replacement without issue. The little compartment holders are useful as well. Wish I had one of these when I lived in my old studio apartment! However, it's nice enough for our med-spa.
customer_reviews.author: cmay1999

customer_reviews.title: Considering a second one!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this desk! It feels sturdy and currently it houses my 21.5" iMac, keyboard, mouse, and VoIP phone - along with little knick knacks here and there. A majority of the cabling is neatly tucked away underneath the desk, which makes for a overall clean-look. And the price was a nice bonus as well!
customer_reviews.author: OkaY1234

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and modern look!
customer_reviews.text: love this desk, easy to assemble and hang. I took the advice from another buyer's post and went and bought screws that were a bit longer to ensure they grip well into the studs. So far so good! my daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: OLShopper010111

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small bedrooms!
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that it is made from particle board, but it looks good and does it’s job.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Mac

customer_reviews.title: Love this for smaller spaces
customer_reviews.text: Love this for smaller spaces, just wish I could fold it up when not in use to save even ore space.
customer_reviews.author: Kailee Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this desk. Purchased for my 9 year old daughter and she loves it. Desk is heavy and must be installed properly to prevent injury. It took 2 people to assemble but it is very sturdy. My daughter gets nothing but compliments on her space saving desk.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I love this desk. It looks so much nicer than a regular computer desk and gives the room a feeling of not losing space like a desk makes it feel. Installation was pretty easy. We didn't have any trouble. I like how you can run one chord up and hide the rest inside the desk also.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Super Cool!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 yr old daughter and I were able to assemble and install. Awesome product. Goes well with the Coaster Round Back Swivel Chair. I didn't want a desk in her room but, this is more like art. Great find and fairly priced! Can't say enough about this product. Make sure you take a look at the measurements. I thought it was bigger because of the photo here, but glad it wasn't. It's perfect !
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing
customer_reviews.text: First, I just have to say I LOVE IT!!!!! This desk has met all my expectations! I have had so many compliments on it already. I love the design, the durability, as well as how easy it was to put together. Now with that being said, I did have a problem (on my part) with securing it to the wall. I don't recommend using the screws that come with it.. They will probably strip out. However, as frustrating as it was at the time, as soon as I made a trip to the local hardware store it worked out great!!
customer_reviews.author: Sparky21

customer_reviews.title: Great desk!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good quality desk! It's been hanging in my son's room and he love it! Pretty easy to put together (I think it was a little under an hour to assemble and hang) and very secure on the wall. Just make sure you attach the hanger-bar into the studs. I'd definitely buy again. The work area is a nice size to do homework!
customer_reviews.author: randy jordan

customer_reviews.title: a great purchase and definitely a space saver if you have ...
customer_reviews.text: This desk has given my room so much space I didn't know I had. It takes awhile to assemble since the parts are not labeled, unfortunately. Mounting to the wall was quick, just added some extra screws to support the weight, but very stable. Overall, a great purchase and definitely a space saver if you have a small space to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Best desks ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I got these desks!! They are sturdy, well designed, and look great!! Perfect for two girls sharing a room!!
customer_reviews.author: Kym

customer_reviews.title: I love this desk
customer_reviews.text: Very easy instructions and the pieces fit perfectly. It only took me 45 minutes to put it together -- even with all the cats helping. The hardest part was getting the bracket on the wall (had to have my husband strong arm the screws into the studs), but once it's on the wall, it's not going to fall off. It's a very sturdy piece of furniture. And for such a low price? I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sleonhard

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: this is not a stable desk!
customer_reviews.text: After seeing pics of the desk with Apple iMacs, I decided to purchase the desk too and it fit great in the largest window in the desk. The desk hangs on a metal bar screwed into your wall... If the front is lifted or bumped on the front by an office chair that goes up and down, you will experience what I did. My new 5k retina 27" iMac screen was shattered. It is costing me $606 to repair. There needs to be an option that secures the desk to the wall rather than just hanging. I would return if I could. Has anyone else experienced breaking valuables with the desk?
customer_reviews.author: Joe Kong

customer_reviews.title: GREAT option for work at home desk
customer_reviews.text: we have it in our living room, and makes it possible for me to be part of family - yet still have my own space. The only thing that would make it nicer would be a Rounded or Beveled edge - so my wrist is not resting on a sharp edge. My mousepad with a gett wrist wrest puts me to high for my mini mouse. right now i have a floppy mouse pad flopped over the edge... Clean quick install...
customer_reviews.author: K. Walfoort

customer_reviews.title: Love this desk
customer_reviews.text: I love this desk super clean and good quality, I love having everything off the floor! It’s exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Space Saver Desk Holds Up
customer_reviews.text: My brother bought this in order to eliminate an L-shaped desk in their spare room. With a new (second) baby on the way, they needed as much room as possible. This floating desk fits perfect in their entry way cubby, between their dining and living areas. It coordinates well and holds everything they need to work, pay bills, and browse the web.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie K. Gill

customer_reviews.title: Another good wall desk.
customer_reviews.text: I have another desk by these guys and really love the wall mounts. The directions with this model leave a couple things out, which you will figure out by the time you're done. I had to take it apart twice to correct. Could of just been me though. There were minor cosmetic defects on this desk, but not worth sending back. Great desk!
customer_reviews.author: dlt074

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build
customer_reviews.text: The desk arrived as scheduled and was a snap to build. Just follow the instructions and it goes together in minutes. Hang the hanger bar on the wall, lift the desk onto it and you are done. Awesome. I put a mirror in the opening, a few LED light bars around the mirror, little baskets that fit the shelves and my wife has a fabulous new dressing table for less than $ 200.
customer_reviews.author: jawoodus

customer_reviews.title: This desk is a great space saver
customer_reviews.text: This desk is a great space saver! Only giving it 4 out of 5 stars because the bottom piece of wood covers the outlet. We measured it exactly for the directions to the proper chair height, which happens to be a standard outlet height. We took the piece of wood off and it still feels sturdy. My 10 yea old daughter loves all the shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Christi Goodwin

product_meta.title: Prepac Floating Desk with Storage, White
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteOptimize your space with Prepac innovative and stylish wall mounted desk. perfectly suited for any home office, den, living room, kitchen or entryway. The stable work surface is perfect for your computer or simply as a place to get your work done. the side compartments and top shelf provide functional storage and visual appeal. Installation is a breeze with Prepac innovative metal hanging Rail system. Proudly manufactured in North America using CARB-compliant, laminated composite wood. ships ready to assemble, includes an instruction booklet for easy assembly and has a 5-year manufacturer's limited warranty.
feature_bullets: Mount at any Height with Prepac metal hanging rail system
Cable and wire management features keep your desk organized
Side compartments with two removable shelves each are ideal for speakers, electronic devices, books, photographs and other personal items
Store books, photographs and other items on the Top shelf

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,838 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
